steps.title: Step 1: How to Set Up Your Seller Account
steps.description: Visit the TikTok Shop Seller Center to register your account.

steps.title: Step 2: Fill out the Application for Each Business Type
steps.description: Follow the general guidelines provided by TikTok Shop to ensure your documents meet the required format.

steps.title: Step 3: Set up Your Store
steps.description: Upload the required Application Documents, set your store name, select product category, complete seller profile, and submit bank account information.

steps.title: Step 4: Upload and List Your Product
steps.description: Use the Product Optimizer to improve product visibility based on issues that your products have.

steps.title: Step 5: Start Selling Your Products
steps.description: Sell products through livestream, short video, showcase, or affiliate link sharing.

steps.title: Step 6: Shipping and Seller Fee
steps.description: TikTok Shop offers two primary shipping methods and updates seller fees for every completed order.

steps.title: Step 7: Tools for Help Your Operation Store
steps.description: Use SiteGiant ERP to integrate TikTok Shop with SiteGiant and manage product listings, inventory, order processing, and customer service.
